price: When they angered Us, We exacted Our retribution and drowned them all.
arabic: فَلَمَّآ ءَاسَفُونَا ٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
